snippet: As the first generation to grow up with a written language — rather than the traditional spoken word — the members of the Hmong American Writers’ Circle are addressing a new kind of coming of age in America.
abstract: Fresno Journal; members of the Hmong American Writers' Circle share unique experience of being first generation among group to grow up with a written language: English; Hmong-Americans face significant challenges, including communication and widespread poverty.
lead_paragraph: As the first generation to grow up with a written language — rather than the traditional spoken word — the members of the Hmong American Writers’ Circle are addressing a new kind of coming of age in America.

headline.main: A Hmong Generation Finds Its Voice in Writing
headline.print_headline: A Hmong Generation Finds Its Voice in Writing
